statements: DELETE FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 AND transaction_date = '2023-05-12';
DELETE FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 AND transaction_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND transaction_amount >= 500.00;
DELETE FROM Customer WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 10 AND subtotal < 100.00;
